title: Slovakia Retail Sales MoM
description: Retail Sales in Slovakia decreased 0.90 percent in September of 2022 over the previous month. Retail Sales MoM in Slovakia averaged 0.29 percent from 1995 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 17.60 percent in March of 2021 and a record low of -14 percent in January of 1997. In Slovakia, the Retail sales report provides an aggregated measure of sales of retail goods and services over a specific time period. In Slovakia, Retail sales are seasonal, volatile and relatively important to the overall economy. This page provides - Slovakia Retail Sales MoM - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Statistical Office of the Slovak Republic
